text:
Hi,
I have got one edit on my custom module as "Please avoid using the HubSpot grid classes in the HTML section of your module. If you wish to create a three column grid, please use your own CSS to accomplish this so that the module works in the preview." But I generally use HubSpot grid classes like "span4, span6" to achieve the results in my design and that modules got approved and works fine. And as far as I know, HubSpot has disabled the preview option on marketplace. What shall I do? Do I really need to write css classes to achieve grid structure?
